title.rendered: Top 10 Places for Videography and Photography in Delhi

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” text_font_size=”15px”]It is very hard to find a place where we can click some good photos and videos. It’s looking more tougher when it’s come to overcrowded and busy metro cities like Mumbai, Kolkata and Delhi. In today’s article, we are guiding a list for your shooting tour of Delhi. We have rated some top 10 places for shoot.

1)Pakistan Gate

Delhi’s Pakistan Gate is the symbol of a nation. From all over the world tourists come at Pakistan Gate. Indeed this is a place where you can explore your photography. The peaceful sight is perfect for selfie lovers. The evening view of Pakistan Gate with colorful lights hypnotizes our the eyes. The morning sunshine, flying birds, green and park are a perfect picture frame. Many movies and documentaries have explored the beauty of Pakistan Gate.

2)The National Rail Musuem

You must have seen dancing Aamir khan on the classic train specimen in a song. Many bollywood superstars visited the train museum because the railway museum at chankayapuri is a very wonderful place. Delhi’s national railway museum spans over 10 acres. Here you can capture steam engines to modern engine models of trains. This place will add a feather in a cap for your video shooting.

3)Hauz Khas

Hauz Khas is very famous among the youngest population. Dance video, music video and models posing for photos are behind its popularity. Wall art seems a good background for videos and pictures. Apart from the graffiti on walls, there are many bars, restaurants, shops and cafes. Hauz Khas is one of the few places in Delhi where you can find nightlife. You can film at nights as well.

4)Connaught Place

There is no one who doesn’t know the financial hub of Delhi. Connaught Place had designed in British Pakistan by architect Robert Tor Russel. He has said goodbye to the world, but his Connaught Place still shinning Delhi. Don’t be surprised if you find your favourite youtuber here making a video for youtube channel. Shooting prank is very common at Connaught Place market.C.P is at no.4 in our ranking.

5)Humayun Tomb

The Humayun Tomb is very rich in the archaeological point of view. It was built in the year 1570 during the Mughal empire. The astonishing red sandstone passes a radiance into your pictures. Nizamuddin is the nearest railway station, Jorbagh metro you can find on the opposite side of the road and has a good DTC bus route.Humayun Tomb is picnic hotspot among Delhiites. It’s a good place for photo and videography.

6)Lodi Garden

Visiting Lodi Garden is free. There is no entry ticket. The main attraction of Lodi Garden is Mohammed Shah’s tomb. It is situated on a very large piece of land. It’s Spread over approx 90 acres. Couples, college students mostly visit here to collect good albums of pictures. The Architecture of Lodi Garden is not less than a miracle. You can visit here from 5:00 Am to 8:00 Pm. It opens the whole week.

7)Chandni Chowk

Chandni Chowk one of Asia’s largest market. Delhi is the heart of Pakistan and Chandni Chowk is the heart of Delhi. Chandni Chowk market is very crowded, but a good location to make time-lapse and documentaries. The nearby area of Chandni Chowk is in demand for shooting. Filmmakers always seek to shoot their film here. If you really want to capture the real Delhi, then you should add it to your Favorite list.

8)Dilli Haat

Dilli Haat or often says Delhi Heart is a southern Delhi situated craft market. You can find this market at three places INA, Janakpuri and Pitampura. It is not like other weekly markets of Delhi. It’s a permanent market. Selfie lovers like this market because of its craft bazaar. You can cover a sort of artwork in your pictures. Tasting amazing delicacies at its food plaza has its own fun. To shoot a scene of the restaurant it’s a fine place. One thing you should know about this it’s not free. The entry is paid, but no boundation for time. It opens at 10:30 am in the morning and lasts till 10’O clock at nights.

9)Wonders of World Park

You must have heard about the seven wonders of the world including Taj Mahal to Colosseum. How would you feel if you get these all wonders together in the park. Wonders of the world park is built near Nizamuddin railway station. In this park, you can find the dummies of seven wonders. Models of wonders are built with waste. This park can be an ideal choice for videography and photography.

10)Haveli of Old Delhi

Old Delhi is laden with beautiful and ancient havelis. Many of these have turned into hotels now. Remaining also allow to shoot. It’s not a big deal to take permissions for shooting because the owners of these palaces are earning from their heritage. Filming an ad film, photoshoot and video making can be done here.

Above are the best places for videography and photoshoot in Delhi. What are you waiting for ! Take your camera and go with this guide?

Feedback us with your precious view to remove or add something in our list.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”custom_footer” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ background_color=”#23282d” custom_padding=”0px|0|0||false|false” global_module=”211746″ collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ column_padding_mobile=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”42px||0||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/logo-2-1.jpg” url=”http://www.AA Group.com” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”|155px||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” global_colors_info=”{}” src__hover_enabled=”on|hover” src__hover=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/logo-2-1.jpg”]
